vendor_name: The Ritz-Carlton O'ahu Turtle Bay (Formerly: Turtle Bay Resort)
title: Hawaii Five-Star Oceanfront Oahu Stay with Four Pools & Two Championship Golf Courses
description: Discover a Hawaiian paradise on the beautiful North Shore of Oahu at the five-star, oceanfront Turtle Bay Resort. Settle into a tranquil rhythm at this peaceful hideaway set on nearly 1,300 oceanfront acres, and be spoiled by the hotel's long list of luxe facilities, including eight onsite dining experiences, four glistening pools and easy access to seven shimmering beaches within walking distance. When youâ€™re not lounging by the gleaming water, stay on top of your wellness game at the onsite fitness centre, tee off at one of two championship golf courses or be pampered with a trip to Nalu Spa.
